mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_email, member_contact, member_birth, member_level, member_addr) values(#{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberContact}, #{memberBirth, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberLevel}, #{memberAddr})
mapper.select: select * from member order by member_join asc
select * from member order by member_join desc
select member_id from member where member_name=#{memberName} and member_email=#{memberEmail}
mapper.update: update member set member_pw = #{memberPw} where member_id=#{memberId}

update member set member_name=#{memberName}, member_addr=#{memberAddr}, member_email=#{memberEmail}, member_contact=#{memberContact}, member_birth=#{memberBirth, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where member_id = #{memberId}
update member set member_self = #{memberSelf} where member_id = #{memberId}
update member set member_level='파워유저' where member_id=#{memberId}
update member set member_level='일반유저' where member_id=#{memberId}
UPDATE member m SET m.member_level = '일반유저' WHERE m.member_id IN ( SELECT p.payment_member FROM payment p INNER JOIN member m ON m.member_id = p.payment_member WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} )
